pullrequest.title: Use proper test cmake macros when builing display or DRI tests

content.raw:
Update: Ray, Imu and Sensor are running fine without a display present: http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo_1.5/job/gazebo-gazebo_1.5-devel-precise-amd64/19/consoleFull

Build them using the standard gz_build_test.
Sorry for the noise
